name: py-ete3

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The Environment for Tree Exploration (ETE) is a Python programming
toolkit that assists in the recontruction, manipulation, analysis and
visualization of phylogenetic trees (although clustering trees or any
other tree-like data structure are also supported).

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyqt5
dependencies.description:
PyQt is a set of Python v2 and v3 bindings for The Qt Company's Qt
application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt
including Windows, OS X, Linux, iOS and Android. PyQt5 supports Qt v5.

dependencies.name: py-lxml
dependencies.description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.

dependent_to.name: py-topiary-asr
dependent_to.description: Python framework for doing ancestral sequence reconstruction.

dependent_to.name: py-pastml
dependent_to.description:
Ancestral character reconstruction and visualisation for rooted
phylogenetic trees.
